caption: The guy crushed us, 7 lairs to 3 to 3. I didn’t realize big swings could happen in Catan Jr. Perhaps more interestingly, he could predict sequences of things I would do if he traded me something. I guess I need to mix it up.
altText: The guy crushed us, 7 lairs to 3 to 3. I didn’t realize big swings could happen in Catan Jr. Perhaps
